author: GaryWestcott
post_text: May 6, 2015 at 6:50 PM#1Hi Forum,Is there a way / macro option to set speed master to multiple fx?Thanks,Gary

posts.author: GaryWestcott
posts.post_text: May 6, 2015 at 6:50 PM#1Hi Forum,Is there a way / macro option to set speed master to multiple fx?Thanks,Gary

posts.author: alenokia
posts.post_text: May 7, 2015 at 3:36 AM#2Hi!!!Assign SpecialMaster (Special Master  3.xRa 4.xSp)  At Effect (Effect Number or Range)Ex: Assign SpecialMaster 4.2 At Effect 5 thru 10=)

title: MACRO To assign Speed master for multiple fx
